rule: The chatbot may consider factors beyond the content and context of the provided input text in performing the classification.
input: The chatbot uses previous conversations to determine the category.
validityText:
The provided input does not comply with the input specification because it is not a complete news article. Instead, it consists of a single sentence that describes chatbot functionality, which does not fulfill the requirement of being a comprehensive news article suitable for classification into specified categories.
ERR
